Rulings.Edison: No rulings found for this card. Request new rulings at https://discord.gg/shVJnYJNpg
Rulings.Tengu:
● At least 1 face-down defense position monster must exist on the field to activate this card.

● Changing monsters to Defense Position, drawing cards, and Special Summoning do not start a Chain.

● You draw 1 card for each monster that is actually changed to face-down Defense Position.

● "Drastic Drop Off" can only be activated if the special summon is not performed.

● Cards like "Solemn Warning" can be used to negate the activation of this card, but not the end phase effects.

● If you do not draw any cards, you cannot special summon 1 Level 7 or higher LIGHT Reptile monster.

● This card can be activated while cards like "Fossil Dyna Pachycephalo" are face-up on the field, but unless they leave the field before the end phase, the special summon is not performed.

Rulings.Base:
1. You cannot activate this card during the Damage Step.
2. You cannot activate this card if there are no face-down Defense Position monsters on the field.
3. Changing monsters to Defense Position, drawing cards, and Special Summoning do not start a Chain.
4. You draw 1 card for each monster that is actually changed to face-down Defense Position.
5. If you do not Special Summon 1 Level 7 or higher LIGHT Reptile-Type monster from your Deck, "Drastic Drop Off" can be activated after you draw the cards from this effect.
6. If you cannot change your LIGHT Reptile-Type monsters to face-down Defense Position due to "Dark Simorgh", you cannot draw cards or Special Summon 1 Level 7 or higher LIGHT Reptile-Type monster.
7. None of these effects occur simultaneously.
8. [FORUM] You can activate "Royal Oppression" or "Solemn Warning" to negate "W Nebula Meteorite".

PSCT.Base: Change all face-down monsters on the field to face-up Defense Position. During the End Phase this turn, change all face-up LIGHT Reptile-Type monsters you control to face-down Defense Position, then draw 1 card for each. After that, you can Special Summon 1 Level 7 or higher LIGHT Reptile-Type monster from your Deck.
